[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium][color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][IMG]https://i.imgur.com/MZQZpsY.png[/IMG][/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=662802][img]https://i.imgur.com/i36UAgI.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=#ffffff]More Hack Forums Improvements[/color][/b]
In a recent thread created by [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999ff]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url], he has given us few updates along with few other members who are working together.

Some of the work that has been noted:
[quote='Omniscient' pid='56819827']
1. Viral Dragon helped me move the Wiki site to a new server which is cheaper and has better specs. We had some complications that probably wasted a lot more time than either of us liked but so be it. Site is moved to an HF subdomain as https://wiki.hackforums.net and of course the link in header is there. Thanks not just to VD but also a couple members on the Wiki team who assisted.
[hr]
2. Xerotic is working on finishing the Paid Stickies plugin which will completely automate the process. We are both hoping to have it done and installed here by Monday. Progress is good.
[/quote]

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999ff]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] has also given us a tentative 1-2 weeks to look forward to as Trust Scan may make its way back into our forum and back into our hearts

[size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5814556]>>see thread[/url][/size]

[i]UPDATE:[/i] Trust Scan is LIVE! Read more: https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5816710

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3725052][img]https://i.imgur.com/YqYzQcC.png[/img][/url][/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3322334][img]https://i.imgur.com/H5MRIbN.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Great Pacific Garbage Patch is far Larger Than we Thought[/color][/b] 
Many of you may not even be aware that this exists, but there is a giant patch of garbage loose in the Pacific ocean. A bold new study estimates its size at more than twice the size of Texas, and more than the combined weight of 43,000 cars. More specifically, that would be 87,000 tons. The garbage patch is mostly composed of miscellaneous pieces of plastic wear, such as eating utensils or plastic containers. Researchers are now doubling down on efforts to further identify the composition of this massive load in order to develop methods to most efficiently break it down. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pbs.org/newshour/science/the-great-pacific-garbage-patch-weighs-more-than-43000-cars-and-is-way-bigger-than-previously-thought]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Astronomers use Artificial Intelligence to Identify Lunar Craters[/color][/b] 
This newly developed method allows astronomers to discover over 6,000 craters on the surface of the Moon. The process is summed up nicely by Mohamad Ali-Dib, a postdoctoral fellow at University of Toronto’s Centre for Planetary Sciences “Basically, we need to manually look at an image, locate and count the craters, and then calculate how large they are based off the size of the image. Here we’ve developed a technique from artificial intelligence that can automate this entire process that saves significant time and effort.” Also, since the Moon lacks many substances which could cause erosion, such as water, most ancient craters are still intact. These markings, previously unknown to us, are what the team are most interested in uncovering any potentially hidden information. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.astronomy.com/news/2018/03/artificial-intelligence-identifies-6000-new-craters-on-the-moon]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/lv4d7BY.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Doctors Have Restored the Sight of two People in a Monumental World First[/color][/b] 
In an article by Sciencealert.com, it is stated that “British physicians have successfully used stem cells to repair the degenerating tissue at the back of two patients’ eyes,” marking history for this form of surgical accomplishment. Stem cells are an undifferentiated class of cells that are able to separate and form themselves into in a specialized cell type. This surgery was performed on two elderly patients, both of whom “suffered from a condition called macular degeneration,” which is a condition that most commonly occurs in seniors and is simultaneously caused by age. This disease, which takes place in the retina, is responsible for more than “half of all” cases involving blindness. The disease corrodes victims’ back layer of cells located behind “light-sensitive rods and cones forming the eye’s retina.” On patient Douglas Water, there was a patch of “specially designed embryonic engineered stem cells” inserted into his retina. The stem cells were no thicker than 40 microns, and no wider than 4 by 6 millimeters. For comparison’s sake, that’s just slightly larger than a single strand of hair.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.sciencealert.com/stem-cell-therapy-reverses-macular-degeneration-british-patients]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.medicalnewstoday.com/info/stem_cell]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Vladimir Putin wins Election in Landslide Victory[/color][/b] 
On March 18, 2018, Vladimir Putin was declared the winner of Russia’s election. Unsuspectingly, Putin tallied up nearly 77% percent – coming in with 76.69% of all ballots. Pavel Grudinin, the Communist Party candidate, “took second place with 11.77%,” followed by Vladimir Zhirinovsky (Liberal-Democrat), who had 5.65%; Ksenia Sobchak (Civil Initiative party), who obtained 1.68%; Grigory Yavlinsky (Yabloko) having 1.05% and followed by a multitude of other candidates who trailed behind greatly. “The March 18 presidential election in Russian was transparent, competitive and in line with the law, Central Election Commission’s Head Ella Pamfilova said,” preceding the tally of each politician’s ballot percentages. It is stated that not even 66% of all Russian citizens voted, whereas a total of only 73 million placed their vote on a designated frontrunner. Though compared to the 2012 election, this is an increase, being that the prior percentage was just 65.34%, a minor 2.2% increase nonetheless. However, the “Russian voters abroad were the most active since 2000, the election chief said.” Compared to 2012’s number set at 442,286 voters, there were 32,330 additional voters, totaling 474,616.  [i][size=x-small][url=http://tass.com/politics/995729]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Trump Signs Spending bill Hours After veto Threat[/color][/b] 
President Donald Trump has allegedly signed a $1.3 trillion spending bill, avoiding a government shutdown just hours after he threatened to veto the bill, initially. On March 23, Trump warns Congress “he ‘will never sign a bill like this again.’” President Trump threatened to cause another government shutdown but abruptly changed his mind just before signing his approval of the $1.3 trillion budget plan that Congress offered. Trump states that ‘there are a lot of thing that I’m unhappy about in this bill,’ additionally stating that no other bill like such will ever receive his signature nor approval again. President Trump was hasty about the signing, but because the plan includes the proper amount of funding he requested for military spending, his mind was altered in favor of the bill. The conflict firstly started with Trump’s signature tweet, stating that he “stunned Republican lawmakers by threatening to veto the spending bill because of lingering disputes over funding for a U.S.-Mexico border wall and the failure to address an immigration program for children.’ After a few additional tweets and discussions later, everything was set in stone. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/politics/2018/03/23/trump-threatens-veto-spending-bill-raises-possibility-government-shutdown/452273002/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/9ofBPAL.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]PUBG Viewers Had the Chance to Win Free KFC[/color][/b] 
Taking the phrase "winner winner chicken dinner" to a whole new level, Twitch and KFC have come together to host an event that happened this past weekend. On March 24 and 25, the two hosted an event that gave the viewers of four popular streamers a chance to win a free KFC dinner. The four streamers selected were Sacriel, Sequisha, Anthony Kongphan, and Dr. Lupo. Whenever any of the four streamers won a game of the popular Battle Royal PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds, viewers were supposed to spam the chat with the KFC bucket emote. It does sound like a bit of a sellout if you totally think about it. Completely up to you. Prize winners were awarded a $20 KFC gift card. That is not all that KFC and Twitch were giving away. Random viewers were selected to get free KFC inspired items in loot crates. Whether it was real or not it does not mean in-game items but real life physical ones. Things like a Colonel Sanders ghillie suit and a ballistic mask are just one of many rewards. Depending on how many victories the streamers win, the more prizes there were to be given away. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pcgamer.com/pubg-viewers-can-win-free-kfc-chicken-dinners-this-weekend-on-twitch/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Star Wars Open-World Game in the Works at EA[/color][/b] 
A brand new Star Wars game is currently being worked on by EA. Will it also include some loot boxes? Let us see how many people brush past this meme. Continuing on, the game was actually discovered not by an announcement by EA itself, but on their website under job listings. If anyone who wants to become a lead online engineer at EA, apply now! The game is said to be a new open world project where you can lead your online team. Considering the game was not even announced publicly there is really no information on the game. Rumors report that a multi-platform system may be put in place for matchmaking too. Let us hope for the best and that there will be no microtransactions to ruin the game. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/star-wars-open-world-game-in-the-works-at-ea-accor/1100-6457652/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Fornite Coming to Android Soon[/color][/b] 
Fortnite recently hit the iOS app store and is available to download if you have an access code. The game rose up in the charts fairly quickly. In addition, PUBG also hit the iOS app store and as opposed to Fornite (at the current moment) is completely open to the public. Those who wish to play the game on Android will be getting their version of the game but they will have to wait a little longer. Currently, the iOS version of the game has over 50,000 reviews, and rumors suggest that they have made over $2 million which is a huge accomplishment considering the game is not even fully released yet and is invite only. There is no current estimate of when the game will be coming for Android, but Epic Games suggest it will be coming to the Google store in a few months. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.express.co.uk/entertainment/gaming/936364/Fortnite-Mobile-Android-Massive-news-Epic-Games-download]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Pop Team Epic Teams Up With Batman Ninja for Collaboration Figures[/color][/b] 
In this day and age, many people come together to collaborate their ideas and stun the world with what they have to offer. Clothing companies often release these collaborations of clothing that really bring a cult following to the market. For example, Supreme and their collabs with well-known brands like North Face definitely bring forth a whole new light for clothing lovers. This is not only the case for clothing, but anime fans go crazy for collabs and crossovers. If you are a fan of Pop Team Epic and the Batman series, then you are in for a surprise, that is for sure. Nendoroid figures are collaborating with Batman to bring you two cute figures that will be shown at AnimeJapan this March. The collaboration shows Pipimi as the Joker and Popuko will be Batman. Take an early look at the figures [url=https://i.imgur.com/rctHnHn.jpg]here[/url]! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2018-03-23/pop-team-epic-teams-up-with-batman-ninja-for-collaboration-figures/.129353]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Re:Zero -Starting Life In Another World- Reveals New OVA Title![/color][/b] 
Re:Zero is currently in production of creating an OVA which is titled, "Re:Zero -Starting Life in Another World-: Memory Snow!". Currently scheduled to be featured in theatres across Japan this fall, the OVA will have a snow theme to it. There is currently not much known about the OVA episode just yet other than visuals that were released on the official website. Possibly more information will be shared during the AnimeJapan convention. Check out the information at the [url=http://re-zero-anime.jp/news/#news-212]official website[/url] yourself. The artwork is adorable and amazing. The cover shows off Subaru, Emilia and other favorite characters like Rem and Ram. The most important character of all is missing though! Where is our beloved Felix? [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5ab0c3b0ea4dd8676d33da33/Re-Zero-Starting-Life-In-Another-World-Reveals-New-OVA-Title!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Toei Unveils Robot Girls NEO Anime Shorts for Summer[/color][/b] 
Toei Animation posted on their website that a brand new anime is in the works based off of Robot Girls. The title of the anime has been revealed to be "Robot Girls NEO." The anime will contain anime shorts that are based off Toei Animation's Robot Girls Z anime. The anime shorts will contain a new set of cast members, and the main characters will be three characters by the name of Hina Kino as Z-chan, Ami Hagihara as Gre-chan, and Mikako Izawa as Gren-chan. There is a current crowdfunding campaign going on to not only promote the series but to get funds to support the project obviously. At the current time the campaign has received around $14,000, and the campaign will end May 5. The original series the anime short is based on was released in Japan back in 2014. Crunchyroll has the anime in their streaming service so feel free to watch it there if you have not done so already. Who does not want to see cute anime girls kick butt? [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2018-03-22/toei-unveils-robot-girls-neo-anime-shorts-for-summer/.129322]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
